overview: A miracle that I met in this world where 7 billion people live. A cohabitation life that accumulates the daily lives of two people who fall in love like a drama. "Hey, SEX ..." I fell in love with Yua so much that the world overflowed. Full-length cinematic movie shooting! Dramatic visual beauty like never before! We were born for this love. I vowed to stay together all the time. However, the ultimate emotional cohabitation drama spelled out with cinematic images that have been loved for a long time.
title: Cohabitation LOVE STORY
